Assembly Travel

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Assembly Travel is the ultimate destination for premium travel luggage, laptop bags, and travel accessories. With a well deserved television feature on Shark Tank India, their team has spared no effort in crafting sleek designs and carefully selecting durable materials to guarantee that Assembly Travel offers everything necessary to enhance your travel experience in style. Whether you are heading out on a business trip or setting off for a weekend getaway, you can rely on Assembly to keep your essentials organised and shielded every step of the journey.

SCOPE

  • Web UI/UX

INDUSTRY

Travel Accessories And Retail

CHALLENGES

Finding a balance between simple and
informative

01

Ensuring that the simplistic design did not compromise the functionality of the UI/UX.

02

Balancing the desire for minimalism with the need to convey a wide range of features

03

Adapting the UI/UX to accommodate different styles while maintaining visual harmony.

04

Maintaining a consistent and intuitive user experience.

SOLUTION

Addressing These Challenges Head-On

To ensure that the minimalistic design did not compromise functionality, Brandemic started by refining the UI/UX until it struck the perfect balance between simplicity and usability. We implemented interactive elements and intuitive navigation to effectively convey the wide range of features within Assembly’s product lineup while maintaining a clean and minimalist design aesthetic. Additionally, we used responsive design principles to seamlessly adapt the UI UX, ensuring visual harmony and a consistent, intuitive user experience across all platforms.

Experiences Designed For Visual Appeal

UI/UX

We wanted to showcase our proficiency in design by adapting to the minimal style of Assembly while also enhancing the web experience.

IMPACT

Making A Bang In
All The Right Ways

The work Brandemic did for Assembly with their UI and UX designs is proving to be quite visually captivating and could open gateways for more influx of potential customers for them. We were also successfully able to position their brand well enough to reach their desired customer base.
